package.name: gcc64
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-build SED=sed export SED if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc /usr/local/gcc73/bin/gcc73" export CXX="distcc /usr/local/gcc73/bin/g++73" else export CC='/usr/local/gcc73/bin/gcc73' export CXX='/usr/local/gcc73/bin/g++73' fi ../gcc-${PKGVERSION}/configure --prefix=/usr/local/${PKGNAME} \ --enable-shared \ --enable-threads=posix --enable-__cxa_atexit \ --enable-clocale=gnu --enable-languages=c,c++ \ --disable-multilib --disable-libatomic \ --disable-libgomp \ --disable-libitm \ --disable-libmudflap \ --disable-libquadmath \ --disable-libsanitizer \ --disable-libssp \ --with-system-zlib --program-suffix=64 if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then make -j $jobcount else make -j 4 fi
